entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
